english.title: Ramadan Came to us
text: Ramadan came to us and made us overjoyed
You go away for long and abandon us
and our hearts remain with you
And you visit us once a year
We prepare for your arrival for so long
And we set and arrange for everything for you
The day you come to us
you're [as glamorous] as a groom and a bride
We become overjoyed and set up decorations for you
When you loom we bang the drums for you
And we cheer for you and say
Oh Mesaharaty,1bang your drum under our windows
Make us hear and keep singing for us

english.title: Resident in Sayda
text: Resident in El Sayeda neighborhood and my lover is resident in El Hussein
And to gain her satisfaction, I go to her twice a day
From El Sayda to El hussein
For a lover like a gazelle
Every day I leave our neighborhood
And every enamoured guy like myself
And his heart is not right here
And my heart is puzzled between El Sayda and El Hussein
Resident in El Sayeda* neighborhood and my lover is resident in El Hussein
And to gain her satisfaction, I go to her twice a day
From El Sayda to El hussein
I swear if she responds, love and make me the happiest man ever
with my life I will return the favor to whoever guided her to my love
Between El Sayda and El Hussein
Resident in El Sayeda* neighborhood and my lover is resident in El Hussein
And to gain her satisfaction, I go to her twice a day
From El Sayda to El hussein
I pass by the love home
And I wish my fate is with her
And that love unite us togther
From El Sayda to El hussein
